Sentencas: Recently, the penetration of renewable energy into the power sector has dramatically increased; thus, electrical energy storage (EES) systems with long duration time, high capacity, and high energy density are essential.
Titulo: HIGH-EFFICIENT reversible solid oxide fuel cell coupled with waste steam for distributed electrical energy storage system

Sentencas: Reversible solid oxide fuel cell (RSOFC) systems have become a promising candidate for this important role.
Titulo: HIGH-EFFICIENT reversible solid oxide fuel cell coupled with waste steam for distributed electrical energy storage system

Sentencas: In this study, a new RSOFC system coupled with waste steam considering the compatibility between charge and discharge modes is proposed.
Titulo: HIGH-EFFICIENT reversible solid oxide fuel cell coupled with waste steam for distributed electrical energy storage system

Sentencas: A lumped model of RSOFC stack was integrated into EBSILON (R) Professional commercial software for system analysis.
Titulo: HIGH-EFFICIENT reversible solid oxide fuel cell coupled with waste steam for distributed electrical energy storage system

Sentencas: Parametric studies were conducted to examine the effects of fuel composition, waste steam temperature, and steam conversion ratio on three system round-trip efficiency types: reference system round-trip efficiency (eta(RT1)), electrical roundtrip efficiency (eta(RT2)), and exergy round-trip efficiency (eta(RT3)).
Titulo: HIGH-EFFICIENT reversible solid oxide fuel cell coupled with waste steam for distributed electrical energy storage system

Sentencas: Base case calculation shows that the system round-trip efficiencies eta(RT1), eta(RT2), and eta(RT3) are 37.9%, 53.8% and 49.6%, respectively.
Titulo: HIGH-EFFICIENT reversible solid oxide fuel cell coupled with waste steam for distributed electrical energy storage system

Sentencas: In the parametric analysis, as hydrogen volume concentration in the hydrogen-steam mixture in the SOEC mode was increased from 10% to 60%, eta(RT1) and eta(RT2) increased, reaching a maximum value of 54.2% and 38.7% at 30% and 40% of H-2 concentration, respectively.
Titulo: HIGH-EFFICIENT reversible solid oxide fuel cell coupled with waste steam for distributed electrical energy storage system

Sentencas: The exergy round-trip efficiency had the same trend as eta(RT2) and reaches maximum value of 50.1%.
Titulo: HIGH-EFFICIENT reversible solid oxide fuel cell coupled with waste steam for distributed electrical energy storage system

Sentencas: The waste steam temperature had a small effect on all round-trip efficiency types.
Titulo: HIGH-EFFICIENT reversible solid oxide fuel cell coupled with waste steam for distributed electrical energy storage system

Sentencas: The increase in steam conversion ratio relatively improved eta(RT1) and eta(RT)(3), but negligibly influences eta(RT2).
Titulo: HIGH-EFFICIENT reversible solid oxide fuel cell coupled with waste steam for distributed electrical energy storage system

Sentencas: The proposed system provided a solution for upgrading the EES system performance via integrating a RSOFC system with low exergy waste steam.
Titulo: HIGH-EFFICIENT reversible solid oxide fuel cell coupled with waste steam for distributed electrical energy storage system

Sentencas: The efficiencies eta(RT2) and eta(RT3) were much higher than n RD because of the use of waste steam.
Titulo: HIGH-EFFICIENT reversible solid oxide fuel cell coupled with waste steam for distributed electrical energy storage system

Sentencas: The exergy round-trip efficiency with consideration of waste steam exergy was a good indicator of system performance.
Titulo: HIGH-EFFICIENT reversible solid oxide fuel cell coupled with waste steam for distributed electrical energy storage system
